formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = (p-2)(p-1)^(e-1). - _David W. Wilson_, Sep 01 2001
maple: A003966 := proc(n) option remember; local pf,p ; if n = 1 then 1; else pf := ifactors(n)[2] ; if nops(pf) = 1 then p := op(1,pf) ; (op(1,p)-2)*(op(1,p)-1)^(op(2,p)-1)  ; else mul(procname(op(1,p)^op(2,p)),p=pf) ; end if; end if; end proc:seq(A003966(n),n=1..100) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 07 2011
prog: (PARI) a(n) = {my(f=factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, p = f[i, 1]; f[i, 1] = (p-2)*(p-1)^(f[i,2]-1); f[i, 2] = 1); factorback(f);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 27 2015
author: _Marc LeBrun_
